title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.6 - Answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.6 - Answer

State Regulations

The certificate holder shall, within 30 days of the date of
the notice of hearing, respond to the statement of matters asserted in the
notice. Failure to serve an answer to the notice shall constitute an admission
of the matters asserted and a waiver of the right to any
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
103.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
